subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Yuzuru Hanyu had a nearly flawless free skate at the world championships in Saitama, Japan, to become the first man in 12 years to win the Olympic and world titles in the same year.
snippet: Yuzuru Hanyu had a nearly flawless free skate at the world championships in Saitama, Japan, to become the first man in 12 years to win the Olympic and world titles in the same year.
